Sock-as-a-Service (SaaS) - A subscription-based service that delivers new socks to customers on a regular basis, ensuring they always have a fresh pair.
Smart Socks - Socks that use sensors to monitor the wearer's foot temperature, moisture levels, and pressure, providing personalized comfort and reducing the risk of foot problems.
Sock-Making Robot - A machine that can create custom-made socks from scratch, using a variety of materials and designs to meet the customer's specific needs and preferences.
Sock-Swapping Platform - A platform that allows users to swap their old socks for new ones, reducing waste and promoting sustainability.
Sock-Making Kits - Kits that include all the materials and instructions needed to make your own socks at home, allowing users to create unique and personalized designs.
